posts.post_content:
Card described and priced as follows:

Bull Durham NY Natl. VG, Light Crease lower border, a little smudgy $58 SOLD
Dubuc Cinn. G/VG, Horizontal Creasing midline, nice color $45 SOLD
Needham Chi. Natl. P/F Heavy Creasing, Smudgy tough catcher pose $38 Sale Pending
Knight NY Amer. VG/EX clean no creases gorgeous color, nice card $55 SOLD Dave A please contact me by PM, your yahoo email is not working.

All El Principe de Gales Backs.
First I'll take it gets the card/cards. 
Money Order or Check preferred but will accept paypal "gift" option.
RayB

I'll take the knight....assuming that there is no mark on the back (couldn't quite tell from the scan)

email me at [url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url] for payment details

[quote name="scottglevy" post=812852]I'll take the knight....assuming that there is no mark on the back (couldn't quite tell from the scan)

email me at [url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url] for payment details[/QUOTE]

Scott - Thanks.
From very close inspection it does appear there is what looks like a very faint pen mark in the upper left back border. That is also a small stain (tobacco?) in the lower back border as well.
The front is really nice though.
Let me know if you still want it. I'll knock $10 off the price from $65 to $55.
RayB
